-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              Episode Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Animated comedy clip show in which Slabovia.tv's teenage geniuses Kierky and
Nietzsche explore the life and works of the ten greatest philosophers. Today
K&N look at freedom fighter and "Rights of Man" dude Thomas Paine. A clip of a
nobleman unable to get onto a horse illustrates Paine's views on monarchy.

                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The sixth episode out of ten of a educational show on Channel 4 (UK). The
episode number is from the Channel 4 learning website, so is official. Enjoy!
Encoded this from a cap from the +1 channel because the recording on the normal
channel had signal errors (probably snow! :P)
